channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for UT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for UT

item.title: Report E-2024100734
item.description:
Report E-2024100734

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-05T00:41:19+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-16
  • City: DUCHESNE
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: MARATHON PETROLEUM COMPANY LP
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: During the loading process, the correct pressure release valves were not open and allowed for a build up of pressure to crack the welded seams.
